status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.section: Prepare fecal samples
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"54u66","text":"Add  phosphate buffered saline (PBS, pH 7.4) to an Eppendorf tube.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":4,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"agcaa","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"1","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}}}}

steps.section: Prepare fecal samples
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"3plhj","text":"Use cotton tipped wooden swabs to wipe a fecal sample in four places.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cm9rt","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"a6anl","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"7avq3","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"25ha8","text":"Consistence of fecal samples can vary. For drier samples cotton tipped can be dipped into PBS prior to wiping the fecal samples. ","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

steps.section: Prepare fecal samples
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"dmp99","text":"Place the cotton swab with fecal material into the PBS in the Eppendorf tube.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Prepare fecal samples
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"3s7bq","text":"Move the swab up and down within the PBS three time to remove as much feces as possible.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Prepare fecal samples
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"7uipu","text":"While removing the swab, let swab contact the top inside of Eppendorf tube with slight pressure to avoid losing solution.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"c0vgm","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"2fg68","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"cc4pk","text":"Some PBS will remain on the swab after removal.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"20s0l","text":"Add additional amount of PBS to make fecal suspension solution for each sample.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":36,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"f6rbf","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"1","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}}}}

warning: {"blocks":[{"key":"7iqgt","text":"SARS-CoV-2 is a Biosafety Level 3 agent and samples should be handled as approved by each insitution. Proper PPE including double gloves, disposable or autoclavable gown, N95 with face shield or CAPR unit is required and must be used when working in the BSL-3. Gloves and lab coats are required for extraction and PCR setup. Gloves must be worn at any time when touching extraction or PCR plates or reagents. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
